name: Terminal Trainer
description:
This game was created in a weekend for:
---  Mini Jam 121: Reflection ---
A biweekly 72 hour game jam!

-----Instructions-----

Welcome to Terminal Trainer!

During the Simulation your Terminal will be swarmed by various warnings, errors and viruses.

Defeat enemies by locating them on your [LEFT SCREEN] with [Viewfinder.exe] and clicking on them.

To buy upgrades from [UpgradeWindow.exe] you will need #Coins

Use [Viewfinder.exe] on your [RIGHT SCREEN] to locate #Coins and to mine them.

The Health of your Terminal is indicated with a Light Interface.

-----Controls-----

Interact with Buttons by pressing the [LEFT MOUSE BUTTON]

Press [LEFT SHIFT] to lock onto a monitor, press it again to release.

Press the [START BUTTON] located on your console to begin a simulation

Press the [RESET BUTTON] to reset the simulation

Press the [EXIT BUTTON] to exit the simulation

Press the [SENSITIVITY BUTTON] located on your console to change terminal sensitivity
